titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (S. 2845) to reform the intelligence community and the intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-797, by Mr. Linder.
All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 259.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 870.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/7/2004--Passed House without amendment. Waives points of order to provide for consideration of the conference report to accompany S. 2845 (Intelligence Reform and Terrorism Prevention Act of 2004).
